product_name: Mio ALPHA Strapless Continuous Heart Rate Monitor Watch
long_description: Love your heart rate monitor's chest strap? We didn't think so. With the Mio ALPHA Heart Rate Watch, kiss your sliding, chafing chest strap goodbye and enjoy accurate, comfortable monitoring.
